text: The First Straujuma cabinet was the government of Latvia from 22 January to 5 November 2014. It was the first government to be led by Laimdota Straujuma, who was Prime Minister between 2014 and 2016. It took office on 22 January 2014, after the resignation of Valdis Dombrovskis and was abolished on 4 November 2014, as the Second Straujuma cabinet formed. It was the first government of Latvia, led by a woman. title: First Straujuma cabinet
